---

This hefty spiked club is made from the fossilized tail-club of a young ankylosaurus. It can be wielded as a _+2 greater striking [morningstar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=8)_.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> command;     **Effect** The _ankylostar_ grows and transforms into a _+2 greater striking greatclub_, but it retains the [versatile (piercing)](/Traits.aspx?ID=200) trait of a morningstar. While in this form, the _ankylostar_ has Bulk 2 and requires two hands to wield. It can be returned to its morningstar form with another 1-action command.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;  **Requirements** The _ankylostar_ is in its greatclub form; **Effect** The _ankylostar’s_ length extends as you swing the club in a wide arc. You Strike up to three creatures in a 15-foot cone; this counts as one attack for the purpose of calculating your multiple attack penalty. Alternatively, you [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) up to three creatures in a 15-foot cone, rolling a separate [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check for each creature.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
